title: The Rawhide Kid (2010) #2
description:
“TOMBSTONE BLUES,” PART 2
The sharpest-dressed sharpshooter in Wild West is back in the saddle again – and this time he’s not riding alone!  When Wyatt and Morgan Earp are taken hostage by Cristo Pike and his pack of pistoleros, the Rawhide Kid must put together a posse of the greatest western heroes in the Marvel Universe to rescue the Earp brothers and bring Pike to justice: Kid Colt, Doc Holliday, Annie Oakley, Billy the Kid, Red Wolf and The Two-Gun Kid!  But before the Sensational Seven faces its High Noon showdown, it’s got to get there in one piece – which ain’t easy considering this posses’ complicated history.
Parental Advisory …$3.99
